title: Story detail narrative-first reading experience with summary at bottom

requirements.summary: Reorder Story detail content to show narrative verse text first and the story summary at the bottom, removing the 'Key Verses' framing while keeping image view/upload unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Story detail page, the verse list is presented as the story text (narrative verses) and is clearly readable as a continuous story experience.
The story summary is displayed after the narrative verse text (at the bottom of the page content).

Any user-facing heading/label that implies the verses are only "Key Verses" is removed or replaced with an English label that reflects narrative story text (e.g., "Story" / "Scripture" / "Story Text").
Story image display/upload behavior remains unchanged (admin can upload/replace; non-admins can view only).

file_operations.description: Update the Story detail layout to (1) keep the existing title and image section intact (including the current admin-only ImageUploadSection behavior), (2) replace the "Key Verses" heading with an English narrative label (e.g., "Story Text" / "Scripture"), (3) render verses as continuous narrative reading text (remove quote marks and avoid card-per-verse styling that suggests highlights-only), and (4) move the story.summary block to the bottom after the verses (optionally under a "Summary" heading). Ensure existing image rendering continues to use the current ExternalBlob direct URL approach (blob-storage) via the existing components; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
